snippet: By orchestrating the careers of leading conductors, he became one of the most powerful figures in classical music in the second half of the 20th century.
abstract: Ronald A Wilford, who became one of the most influential figures in classical music in the 20th century by managing careers of leading conductors, dies at age 87.
lead_paragraph: By orchestrating the careers of leading conductors, he became one of the most powerful figures in classical music in the second half of the 20th century.

headline.main: Ronald A. Wilford, Manager to a Host of Legendary Maestros, Dies at 87
headline.print_headline: Ronald A. Wilford, 87, a Manager to a Host of Legendary Maestros
